modified gene function, which cannot be explained by altered nucleotide sequence alone. Modifications 
of metabolic gene expression include short-term histone methylation, acetylation, phosphorylation, 
ubiquitination and longer-term DNA silencing as a result of DNA methylation [8,10,11]. Epigenetic changes
